landing.hero_title: Radical Clarity for Your Internal Chaos
landing.hero_subtitle: STATUS CORE precisely identifies your current mental and emotional state to unlock your next level of performance.
landing.hero_anonymous: 100% Anonymous & Secure • No initial registration required
landing.how_it_works_subtitle: Three steps to understand what is blocking your potential.
landing.step1_desc: 14 deep questions based on cognitive science and high-level performance.
landing.step2_desc: We identify which of the 8 operational states you are in through our analysis engine.
landing.step3_desc: Detailed report with immediate practical actions to restore your alignment.
landing.methodology_desc: It's not just a questionnaire. It's a systemic algorithm that assesses the interconnection between Health, Work, Relations, Finances, Identity, Leisure, and Meaning.
landing.enterprise_desc: Reduce burnout and maximize operational clarity. Anonymous diagnostics for high-performance groups seeking the next level of alignment.
landing.footer_tagline: Advanced Personal Intelligence for High Performance.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.empty_desc: You haven't taken any assessment yet. Start now to discover your current state in 7 pillars.

assessment.title: State Diagnosis
assessment.question: Question
assessment.qualitative_desc: Describe freely how you feel today or what situation is currently draining your energy.

1.text: I feel I have enough physical energy to perform my activities without extreme exhaustion.

2.text: I have been getting good quality sleep and wake up feeling that my body has rested.

3.text: I am clear about my next professional growth goals.

4.text: I feel enthusiastic and appropriately challenged during my work routine.

5.text: I feel I have a solid support system in my relationships (family/friends).

6.text: I can express my needs and feelings clearly in my relationships.

7.text: I have peace of mind regarding my current financial stability.

8.text: I feel I have the autonomy to make financial decisions without excessive fear of the future.

9.text: I am clear about my core values and act in accordance with them.

10.text: I feel self-confident about my capabilities and personal worth.

11.text: I can fully disconnect from work and obligations during my downtime.

12.text: I have hobbies or leisure activities that bring me genuine fun and joy.

13.text: I feel a connection with something larger or an existential purpose that guides me.

14.text: My life makes sense to me on a deep level, beyond material success.

preview.title: Your Status
preview.empty_desc: Complete the assessment to see your result.
preview.premium_desc: Unlock the full Status Core v4 Platinum. Receive a 7-day tactical plan, antifragility analysis, and identify your biggest existential bottleneck.

report.title: Full Report
report.antifragility_desc: Systemic resilience based on Identity, Health, and Meaning.
report.unlock_desc: Get personalized AI analysis, 7-day plan, and antifragility metrics.
report.library_desc: Deep knowledge curation to accelerate your neuro-systemic evolution based on your Alpha Pillar.
report.risk_calculation_note: Risks calculated based on score inconsistency patterns.
report.resilience_desc: Your central system's ability to convert external pressure and chaos into growth and accelerated adaptation.
report.archetype_desc: This profile reflects a high level of execution, but with a support structure starting to show signs of systemic fatigue.
report.results_pilar_desc: A deep analysis of each fundamental area of your existence, prioritizing your biggest current bottleneck.
report.pilar_bottleneck_neural: Critical bottleneck identified by neural system
report.projection_desc: Neuro-systemic simulation based on your current state vs. application of the strategic plan.
report.trajectory_desc: With alpha bottleneck correction and systemic rebalancing.
report.inertia_desc: Maintaining current patterns and ignoring detected risk warnings.
report.forecast_quote: “In 90 days, your neural system will have adapted to the new pattern. Inertia today costs approximately 3x more recovery effort in the future.”
report.protocol_quote: “It doesn't matter what you've done until today. The protocol only requires that, in the next 7 days, you protect your Vital Energy like a treasure and execute your Impact Leverage like a biological command.”
report.golden_action_desc: We have identified the systemic game-changer for your current reality.

risk_warnings_data.label: Systemic Fatigue
risk_warnings_data.desc: Your Executive Power is masking a critical drop in Vital Energy.

risk_warnings_data.label: Focus Erosion
risk_warnings_data.desc: Lack of Cognitive Clarity is generating an inefficient reactivity loop.

CONFUSION.label: CONFUSION
CONFUSION.one_liner: Mixed signals between your pillars are generating mental fog.

report.meaning: Confusion v4 occurs when the Identity and Spirituality pillars are misaligned, preventing a clear view of the whole.
characteristics: Difficulty prioritizing which pillar to focus on
Conflict between values and daily actions
report.primary_risk: Wasting energy on areas that do not bring real fulfillment.
report.next_step: Choose one pillar to ignore for 24h and one to focus on 100%.
report.the_no_to_say: Say NO to commitments that harm your identity.
report.mindset_shift: From 'I need more data' to 'I need more silence'.
report.stoic_lesson: Clarity doesn't come from outside, but from organizing what is already inside.

OVERLOAD.label: OVERLOAD
OVERLOAD.one_liner: Health and Leisure pillars are being drained by Work.

report.meaning: Overload v4 is a systemic imbalance where the volume of one pillar suffocates the others.
report.primary_risk: Physical collapse or burnout due to lack of recovery.
report.next_step: Schedule an unconditional hour of leisure for today.
report.the_no_to_say: Say NO to overtime and secondary tasks.
report.mindset_shift: From 'I am a machine' to 'I am a biological system that needs recharging'.
report.stoic_lesson: He who is everywhere is nowhere.

REACTIVITY.label: REACTIVITY
REACTIVITY.one_liner: Conflicts in the Relationships pillar are generating emotional triggers.

report.meaning: Reactivity v4 indicates that your emotional security in relationships is fragile.
report.primary_risk: Breakdown of important bonds and loneliness.
report.next_step: Have a 5-min honest conversation with a loved one.
report.immediate_win: Listen to someone today without interrupting or judging.
report.the_no_to_say: Say NO to impulsive reactive arguments.
report.mindset_shift: From 'They are attacking me' to 'I am lacking emotional support'.
report.stoic_lesson: The best revenge is to not be like him who performed the injury.

UNCERTAINTY.label: UNCERTAINTY
UNCERTAINTY.one_liner: Instability in the Financial pillar generates fear of the future.

report.meaning: Uncertainty v4 is linked to the lack of a material safety net or future plan.
report.next_step: Write down all your fixed costs today.
report.immediate_win: Save or generate a symbolic amount today.
report.the_no_to_say: Say NO to impulsive spending due to anxiety.
report.mindset_shift: From 'I will go broke' to 'I am building my foundation'.
report.stoic_lesson: Poverty is not the lack of possessions, but the greedy longing for more. Focus on internal stability.

DISCONNECTION.label: DISCONNECTION
DISCONNECTION.one_liner: The Spirituality and Meaning pillar is eroding.

report.meaning: Disconnection v4 is existential emptiness. You are 'doing' but not 'being'.
characteristics: Lack of connection with something larger
report.next_step: Do something for someone without expecting anything in return.
report.immediate_win: Spend 15 minutes looking at the sky or nature, without thinking.
report.mindset_shift: From 'What do I get out of this?' to 'How do I serve the world?'.
report.stoic_lesson: We are part of a larger whole. Reconnect with your place in the cosmos.

STAGNATION.label: STAGNATION
STAGNATION.one_liner: Identity pillar has stopped evolving due to lack of new challenges.

report.meaning: Stagnation v4 occurs when you have stopped investing in your own growth.
report.primary_risk: Obsolescence and loss of personal spark.
report.next_step: Start a new learning path today.
report.immediate_win: Read 10 pages of a complex book on a new topic.
report.the_no_to_say: Say NO to the same old routine.
report.mindset_shift: From 'I know enough' to 'I am a lifelong learner'.
report.stoic_lesson: He who has stopped getting better has stopped being good.

CLARITY.label: CLARITY
CLARITY.one_liner: Work and Purpose pillars are in high harmony.

report.meaning: Clarity v4 is when you know who you are and where you are going professionally.
report.next_step: Write your personal work manifesto for the next six months.
report.immediate_win: Spend 30 min planning your next strategic week.
report.the_no_to_say: Say NO to opportunities that don't align with your purpose.
report.mindset_shift: From 'I am busy' to 'I am focused'.
report.stoic_lesson: If a man knows not which port he sails, no wind is favorable.

ALIGNMENT.label: ALIGNMENT
ALIGNMENT.one_liner: Systemic harmony between the 7 fundamental pillars.

report.meaning: Alignment v4 is the peace of someone who has a solid foundation in all areas of life.
report.next_step: Thank 3 people who are part of your support network today.
report.immediate_win: Share a lesson learned with someone.
report.mindset_shift: From 'I achieved it' to 'I sustain it with virtue'.
report.stoic_lesson: Happiness is a smooth and unobstructed flow of life.

correlations.work_vs_health: High Work performance is suffocating your Physical Recovery.
correlations.finance_vs_rel: Financial instability is triggering reactivity in your Relationships.
correlations.id_vs_spir: Your strong Identity needs a higher Purpose to avoid existential emptiness.
correlations.vitality_brake: Your low Vitality is the main break for your mental clarity today.
correlations.harmony: Your pillars operate in relative systemic harmony.

SAUDE.low: Critical vitality level. Your biological response capacity is compromised.
SAUDE.mid: Basic maintenance state. Energy exists, but lacks reserve for high performance.
SAUDE.high: Exceptional vitality. Your body is a support machine for your mind.

TRABALHO.low: Severe professional misalignment or lack of clear progress.
TRABALHO.mid: Stable execution, but impact potential has not yet been fully released.
TRABALHO.high: Professional mastery. You operate in a state of flow and constant value generation.

RELACIONAMENTOS.low: Isolation or systemic toxicity. Your connections are draining your energy.
RELACIONAMENTOS.mid: Stable circles, but lack depth or genuine emotional support.
RELACIONAMENTOS.high: Powerful relational ecosystem. Your network is your greatest source of security and support.

FINANCEIRO.low: Severe scarcity or disorganization generating constant anxiety.
FINANCEIRO.mid: Basic stability, but without the autonomy needed for audacious decisions.
FINANCEIRO.high: Financial antifragility. Your resources sustain your freedom and expansion.

IDENTIDADE.low: Self-crisis. Lack of clarity about personal values and boundaries.
IDENTIDADE.mid: You know who you are, but still bow to excessive external pressures.
IDENTIDADE.high: Absolute sovereignty. Your identity is the unshakable axis of all your actions.

LAZER.low: Anhedonia or total neglect of fun. High risk of collapse due to rigidity.
LAZER.mid: Pauses occur, but do not generate deep regeneration.
LAZER.high: Active regeneration. You use leisure as a strategic high-performance tool.

ESPIRITUALIDADE.low: Deep existential emptiness. Your actions lack a higher why.
ESPIRITUALIDADE.mid: Sporadic connection with purpose, but everyday life still feels purely material.
ESPIRITUALIDADE.high: Transcendental purpose. There is a clear connection with the Meaning that guides your life.

leverages.SAUDE: Zero caffeine intake after 1 PM and move your last meal to 3 hours before sleep.
leverages.TRABALHO: Define your "One Thing" the night before and do not open email before finishing it.
leverages.RELACIONAMENTOS: Schedule a 15-minute distraction-free conversation with a strategic ally for alignment.
leverages.FINANCEIRO: Voluntarily expose yourself to physical discomfort (cold shower) to recalibrate your stress threshold.
leverages.IDENTIDADE: Implement the "Habit Stacking" technique to tie a difficult new habit to your morning coffee.
leverages.LAZER: Eliminate all digital notifications for 4 hours daily during your Golden Hour.
leverages.ESPIRITUALIDADE: Practice 10 minutes of "Non-Sleep Deep Rest" (NSDR) immediately after stress peaks.

login.title: Access your Diagnosis
login.description: Enter your email to save your history and unlock reports.
login.success_description: We sent an access link to your email address.
login.not_received: Didn't receive it? Check spam or try again.
login.agreement: By continuing, you agree to our {terms} and {privacy}.
